mapper.select: select min(st_distance(r.geom,ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(#{x}, #{y}),3857))-(r.road_bt/2)) from dongjak_road r where r.road_bt >=12

select st_distance(p.geom,ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(#{x}, #{y}),3857)) dPolice, split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(p.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',1) policeX, split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(p.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',2) policeY from dongjak_police p order by st_distance(p.geom,ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(#{x}, #{y}),3857)) asc limit 1

select split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(c.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',1) cctvX, split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(c.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',2) cctvY from dongjak_cctv c where st_intersects(c.geom, st_buffer(ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(#{x}, #{y}),3857),#{dRoad}))

select split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(l.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',1) lightX, split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(l.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',2) lightY from dongjak_light l where st_intersects(l.geom, st_buffer(ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(#{x}, #{y}),3857),#{dRoad}))

select split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(e.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',1) entX, split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(e.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',2) entY from dongjak_ent e where st_intersects(e.geom, st_buffer(ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(#{x}, #{y}),3857),#{dRoad}))

select split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(c.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',1) convX, split_part(btrim(split_part(st_astext(c.geom),'(',2),')'),' ',2) convY from dongjak_conv c where st_intersects(c.geom, st_buffer(ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(#{x}, #{y}),3857),#{dRoad}))
